 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָכַר‎</span>] **verb** ==hire== ( = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכַר‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> erroneously for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>); — only **Qal** Participle plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסֹכְרִים‎</span> [[Ezra.4.5|Ezra 4:5]] and hiring against (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>) them agents. 

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכַר‎</span> **verb** ==hire== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תשכר‎</span> ***hire oneself out*** (?), ***recompense*** (?) [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Hofmus. 11</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hired***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***reward, thank***, modern Palestinian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hired***, of land ploughed by hire, Bergheim<sup>PEQ 1894, 196</sup>; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שכרא‎</span> perhaps ***rewarding*** [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>375</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[Deut.23.5|Deut 23:5]]; [[2Kgs.7.6|2Kgs 7:6]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂכָרוֺ‎</span> [[Neh.6.12|Neh 6:12]] 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂכַרְתִּיךָ‎</span> [[Gen.30.16|Gen 30:16]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׂכֹּר‎</span> [[Judg.9.4|Judg 9:4]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכֹר‎</span> [[Gen.30.16|Gen 30:16]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׂכֹּר‎</span> [[1Chr.19.6|1Chr 19:6]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂכֵר‎</span> [[Prov.26.10|Prov 26:10]] (twice in verse), plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂכְרִים‎</span> [[2Chr.24.12|2Chr 24:12]] ([[Ezra.4.5|Ezra 4:5]] see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סכר‎</span>); ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכוּר‎</span> [[Neh.6.13|Neh 6:13]] — ***hire***, retainers [[Judg.9.4|Judg 9:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> pret.), soldiers, etc. [[2Sam.10.6|2Sam 10:6]] = [[1Chr.19.6|1Chr 19:6]]; [[1Chr.19.7|1Chr 19:7]]; [[2Kgs.7.6|2Kgs 7:6]]; [[2Chr.25.6|2Chr 25:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> pret.), priest [[Judg.18.4|Judg 18:4]], artificers [[Isa.46.6|Isa 46:6]]; [[2Chr.24.12|2Chr 24:12]], husband's favour <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכֹר שְׂכַרְתִּיךָ‎</span> [[Gen.30.16|Gen 30:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> pret.); [[Prov.26.10|Prov 26:10]] (twice in verse) obscure, see [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] Toy; for evil purpose [[Deut.23.5|Deut 23:5]] = [[Neh.13.2|Neh 13:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> ***against***), [[Neh.6.12|Neh 6:12]]; [[Neh.6.13|Neh 6:13]], **Niph\`al** ***hire oneself out, Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּלֶּחֶם נִשְׂכָּ֑רוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.2.5|1Sam 2:5]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***earn wages, Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּשְׂתַּכֵּר‎</span> [[Hag.1.6|Hag 1:6]] (as substantive), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> v[[Hag.1.6|Hag 1:6]] (as verb, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location, construction praegn.).
